title: Cause of an increase in aggregate demand

content.question: Which of the following will cause an increase in aggregate demand?

choices.label: An increase in the price level
An increase in the demand for money
A decrease in the supply of money
A decrease in government transfer payments

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
